summary: Comprehensive testing of REALUM educational and economic metaverse platform completed. Backend: 34/35 tests passed (97%). Frontend: All major features working correctly with excellent cyberpunk UI design.

minor.issue: Intermittent 520 server error when applying for jobs
Creates duplicate zone and job IDs on multiple calls (job-13, job-25, cultural, civic zones)

console_warnings.issue: React key warning: Duplicate keys for 'cultural' and 'civic' zones
React key warning: Duplicate keys for 'job-13' and 'job-25'
React key warning: Duplicate keys for 'prop-4' and 'prop-5'

action_items: Fix duplicate IDs in seed endpoint to prevent React key warnings
Investigate intermittent 520 error on job apply endpoint
critical_code_review_comments: Seed endpoint creates duplicate IDs when called multiple times - should use upsert or check for existing data
Zone and job IDs should be unique - consider using UUID instead of sequential IDs
seed_data_creation: POST /api/seed creates 30 jobs, 10 zones, 9 proposals, 5 courses, 5 marketplace items, 3 projects
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features tested and working. Simulation users (Andreea, Vlad, Sorin) are set up and functional. Token burn rate is 2% on all transfers and marketplace purchases. The 2.5D isometric metaverse map uses CSS-based rendering (Three.js was removed). Minor React key warnings exist due to duplicate IDs from seed endpoint.

features_tested.user_registration: PASS - All 5 roles (Creator, Contributor, Evaluator, Partner, Citizen) work
features_tested.dashboard: PASS - Shows user stats, role, badges, token economy
features_tested.metaverse_map: PASS - 2.5D isometric view with 13 zones, interactive zone selection
features_tested.zone_selection: PASS - Shows zone details, buildings, features, job count
features_tested.jobs_page: PASS - Zone filtering works, job cards display correctly
features_tested.marketplace: PASS - Items displayed with purchase functionality
features_tested.dao_voting: PASS - Proposals displayed with vote buttons
features_tested.wallet: PASS - Balance, transfer, transaction history, burn display
features_tested.token_economy: PASS - Total supply, burned tokens, 2% burn rate displayed
features_tested.simulation_setup: PASS - Andreea, Vlad, Sorin users created
features_tested.language_selector: PASS - EN, RO, ES options available
features_tested.leaderboard: PASS - User rankings with XP, level, badges
